item.title: 区间查询问题
item.description: LeetCode 303. Range Sum Query - Immutable Given an integer array nums, find the sum of the elements between indices i and j (i ≤ j), inclusive. Example: Given nums = [-2, 0, 3, -5, 2, -1] sumRange(0, 2) -> 1 sumRange(2, 5) -> -1 sumRange(0, 5) -> -3 Note: You may assume that the array does not change. There are many calls to sumRange function. 解析： 数
